f: -footer "Stonetop Lookup by Squidswell#6584 based on work by Marcus#3244" -color 4d97c4 -thumb https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/829185108157530152/829936258565668954/stonetop.png

help?.help:
-title "Stonetop Lookup Alias" -desc "This is a lookup alias for various aspects of Stonetop.
If you notice any typos, broken formatting, or feel that something is missing, please contact me @Squidswell#6584." -f "Subcommands:|`!st help`|`?` - Shows this message
 
`!st moves` - View the list of available Basic, Special, and core playbook moves
 
`!st tags` - View the list of available item and monster tags

`!st arcana` - View the list of available major and minor arcana from the core rulebook

`!st playbooks` - View the list of available core playbooks/classes

`!st gm` - View the list of available GM-centric information such as their Principles, Agenda, Moves, etc

`!st players` - View the list of available player information such as their Principles and Agenda

`!st steading` - View the list of available improvements to Stonetop from the steading playbook" -f "Sources:|[Stonetop](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1735046512/stonetop/) by Jeremy Strandberg and Jason Lutes"

moves.help:
-title "Stonetop Moves" -desc "Look up moves from the core rulebook.

To see a list of the moves available you can view the moves in each category below by specifying it in the command (e.g. `!st move blessed`)

`Basic
Special
Follower
Expedition
Homestead
Blessed
Fox
Heavy
Judge
Lightbearer
Marshal
Ranger
Seeker
Would-Be Hero
Revenant
Ghost
Thrall`"

tags.help:
-title "Stonetop Tags" -desc "Look up tags from the core rulebook.

View the details of a specific tag by specifying it in the command (e.g. `!st tag area`)" -f "Item Tags|`Area
n Armor
+n Armor
Awkward
Clumsy
Crude
+n Damage
Dangerous
Forceful
Immobile
Messy
x Piercing
Reload
Requires x
Slow
Thrown
Warm
Hand
Close
Reach
Near
Far`" -f "Monster Tags|`Horde
Group
Solitary
Tiny
Small
Large
Huge
Spirit
Fae
Construct
Planar
Undead
Hoarder
Cautious
Cunning
Terrifying
Stealthy
Magical
Organized`"

arcana.help:
-title "Stonetop Arcana" -desc "View the details of a specific arcana by specifying it in the command (e.g. `!st arcana twistedspear`)
This will list the main information of an arcana.
You can look at the moves of major arcana by adding `moves` to the end.
You can look at the consequences of major arcana by adding `cons` to the end.
You can look at the clues to unlocking a minor arcana by adding `clues` to the end.

The names of many of the arcana are long, but this will return the entry if you give it part of the name" -f "Minor Arcana|`Aalz Galt’s Sudden Sinkhole
Old Mother’s Wine
Truth Seeds
Id’n Otez’s Galvanic Infusion
The Tomb-Bog’s Mark
The Fiery Veil
Thunderous Bellow
Shell Game of Souls
Ffyrnig Tonic
Shattering Words of Aalz Childric
Mantle Wraiths
Fear of the Flame
The Six Locks of Sajua
Dark Ice Prison
Ward of Still Waters
Song of the Dool Trees
Opening the Way
Goldleaf Cloak
Nerth Serpent’s Vigor
Helior’s Shining Ring
The Eye, Opened
Peacebond
Preserving Runes
The Drowning Scale
The Sylvan Web
Chimeric Transmogrification
The Green Lord’s Shade
Sanctifying Mark
Call of the Hunt
Dancing Wind Spirit
Satchel of Plenty
Flying Cloak
Convocation of the Soil`

**Major Arcana**
`Staff of the Lidless Orb
Twisted Spear
Demonhide Cloak
Noruba’s Ice Sphere
Mindgem
Whispering Rocks
Blood-Quenched Sword
Shield of the Wisent Witch
Hectumel Codex
Red Scepter
Ring of Daagon
Rune-Laden Scales
Blackwood Fetishes
Storm Markings
Ineffable Words
Redwood Effigy
Hungering Maw of Hlad
Azure Hand`"

gm.help:
-title "GMing Stonetop" -desc "Look up various tables and information for GMing Stonetop

You can see a list of information avalible in each category by specifying it in the command (e.g. `!st gm content`)

**GM Basics**
`content
agenda
coreloop
principles
moves`

**Rules**
`damage
recover
persuade
makeaplan
expeditions`

**Random Tables**
`npcs
discoveries
hazards`

**About the World**
`homefront
traveltimes
relativevalue`"

players.help:
-title "Playing Stonetop" -desc "As players of Stonetop you have responsibilties to make the game fun and compeling as well. Here you can look up information for Playing Stonetop

You can see the information avalible in each category by specifying it in the command (e.g. `!st players content`)

`agenda
principles
content`"

steading.help:
-title "Steading Improvements" -desc "These are the improvements to Stonetop that are shown in the Steading Playbook. More may be made by the GM. Here you can look up the details of each of these improvements (e.g. `!st steading palisade`)

`aurochshunting
expandedhousing
divertingthestream
farreachingreputation
greaterharvest
herdofhorses
rainwatercollection
inn
marketplace
mill
palisade
stonewall
township
weaponsofwar
welltrainedmilita`"
